name: Soldier of Failure 2
description:
Soldier of Failure 2 is the sequel of the 2D platformer with shooter elements. In which you again have to confront the new diverse enemies, their military equipment, and traps. In this game you need to collect all the necessary elements, in order to open the passage, passing through which, you will be taken to a new level. Be careful, think over your every step, because you can step on enemy mine and can die. If you perish, do not worry, the level will restart and you will be able to re-try your luck on the battlefield.



  • A large number of various levels.
  • Animated graphics.
  • Simple, funny gameplay.
  • Unforgettable adventures.
